description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Sy Sinclair] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 135 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Sinclair, Sy Jazz musicians--1930-1950. Music critics--1930-1950. Sound recording executives and producers--1930-1950. Tubists--1930-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1930-1950. Cityscape photographs--1930-1950. Film negatives--1930-1950.
